Articles.Content:
Just like my army challenge but this time build a boat with a Bridge ,Steam Engines 3 Anti Ship Turrets that can rotate 360 and move up and down and one missile battery and AA guns(recommended sunbeam laser for AA) 

Proof a photo of youre boat in the water firing its guns (mods allowed)

Ooh, looks like I gots meself a competitor!

Check out the [Royal Kerbal Military](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4919.0)

> ![yamato1ship1k.png](http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/4596/yamato1ship1k.png)

(I\'ve already used this for several challenges, I hope that is okay)

The Yamato is a battleship and a carrier with two double-barrelled turrets and two triple-barrelled turrets that can turn in any direction with a rear landing strip. As for missiles, I won\'t be able to make them effective because there are just too many parts! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
better then i expected absolutely amazing can you post a vid please mabye use a UAV then shoot it down or better yet land em next to each other and make them have a battle

> 
> better then i expected absolutely amazing can you post a vid please mabye use a UAV then shoot it down or better yet land em next to each other and make them have a battle

Two of these? My computer would explode.

> ![screenshot31-1.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/screenshot31-1.png)

This one is designed to look and act more like a real ship. It doesn\'t meet all the requirements, but that\'s because I made it 1 month ago or so.

> 
> ![screenshot34-1.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/screenshot34-1.png)

Firing.

Those wings on the side are outriggers to keep the thing upright, because the bridge makes it top-heavy.
brilliant can you tell me how to make those designs or put them on spaceship exchange

> 
> > ![yamato1ship1k.png](http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/4596/yamato1ship1k.png)

> 
> 
> 
> (I\'ve already used this for several challenges, I hope that is okay)
> 
> The Yamato is a battleship and a carrier with two double-barrelled turrets and two triple-barrelled turrets that can turn in any direction with a rear landing strip. As for missiles, I won\'t be able to make them effective because there are just too many parts! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Good lord, if that blew up it would cause an XK-class end-of-the-world scenario!

> 
> Good lord, if that blew up it would cause an XK-class end-of-the-world scenario!

Instead of blowing up into a fireball and disappearing after 10some seconds like slightly smaller ships, it can take a good amount of damage on the hulls since they brancjlh from the center. A particle cannon cannot destroy it on the first try, and railguns are not effective either.

And when it does explode, the center finally breaks up I.to two parts like the titanic. The heavy engines make it sink in the back!

> 
> > ![screenshot31-1.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/screenshot31-1.png)

Gravitspa?, isn\'t that cheating?

> 
> Gravitspa?, isn\'t that cheating?

Do you honestly expect me to fly that massive behemoth into the water from the launchpad. Tim did, but his is designed to fly like a plane, mine is designed to look and work like an actual boat. Boats don\'t fly.

Then what\'s this?

![Concept-LockheedC130HercAmphib.jpg](http://www.msacomputer.com/FlyingBoats-old/Concept-LockheedC130HercAmphib.jpg)

> 
> Then what\'s this?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![Concept-LockheedC130HercAmphib.jpg](http://www.msacomputer.com/FlyingBoats-old/Concept-LockheedC130HercAmphib.jpg)

A sea-plane...?

> 
> A sea-plane...?

Exactly. It\'s a flying boat!

> 
> Flying=Moving or able to move through the air with wings

> 
> Boat= A small vessel propelled on water by oars, sails, or an engine
By boat I meant battleship, but clever anyway.

> 
> A sea-plane...?

 yeah but it flost and can move on water so its a boat
is that seaplane even from ksp post a colour photo
